website_summaries.verdict: Merrell tailored the profile of the Siren Edge for ladies as a crossover of athletic and hiking shoes. Its straight-out-of-the-box comfort, no break-in period and true-to-size fit were undeniable. A considerable number of users were convinced that getting a second pair is worth it with its steadfast comfort and support. Its grippy outsole received praises too. As perfect as these hiking shoes may seem, it missed achieving the quality Merrell has been known for. Over and above, Merrell Siren Edge is still a go-to shoe from daily chores to light hiking on the trails.
pros: The Merrell Siren Edge delivered a right-out-of-the-box comfort
This was appreciated by many based on their positive reviews
One even said that she felt like the shoes were made for her
This pair was one of the most comfortable hiking shoes ever, as mentioned by a significant number of wearers
A substantial number of Siren Edge purchasers commended the Vibram outsole
They said that it was able to grip well on muddy and concrete grounds
The support from these Merrell hiking shoes was lauded by the majority
There were no hot spots, no blisters and no foot pains according to a couple of satisfied users
Several wearers liked the adequate toe box room offered by Siren Edge
They noted that there was enough room for them to wiggle their toes
It required virtually no breaking-in period, according to some users
A couple of Merrell stalwarts were enthusiastic in getting their second pair
The design and colorways of Siren Edge received praises from numerous wearers
One buyer even wanted to have a pair in every color
More than a handful liked that these shoes fit true to size
cons: Some buyers questioned the Merrell quality
They noted that the pair they purchased started to show signs of wear after a month
One even experienced that the entire upper separated from its sole on the first day
Siren Edge's lack of cushioning on the heel made a few users felt they were walking on a post

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: purchased a half size bigger than my normal trainer size and they fitted perfectly - they have a nice roomy square toe area so your big toes dont get sore on long walks - did my first 36k in them and no complaints at all - feet comfortable and good grip over various terrains - the shoes appeared to be quite stiff when taken out of the box but softened very quickly and needed very little breaking in - a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: caw

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable. I have winter walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Fits to size, very comfortable. I have winter walking boots, summer walking boots and now these Hiking shoes all from the Merrell range. Love this range as is a great fit for me. If you get your feet measured properly for walking boots (which don't fit or measure the same as your every day shoes) at an outdoor walking shop - say Cotswolds, and find a boot/shoe that fits your foot type then stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: LBB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase with quick free delivery
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these on in a shop and found them a little pricey, but these were at the right price with free delivery so I ordered them from here. They were dispatched and arrived very quickly. Exactly what I wanted and now I am wearing them all the time. Would have no hesitation ordering this brand again from this supplier, although I ordered a size 6 for my size 5 1/2 feet as they don't do half sizes so this is worth bearing in mind. A size 5 would have been too small. A great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: Great light walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these trainers. They were so light and comfortable from the start. Wore them constantly on a weeks walking holiday in Spain and not a single blister. Ideal for dry terrain but waterproof version may be better for British weather!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby jones

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them. Only just big enough. I have quite wide feet and these are perfect. I bought them for dog walking through the summer/autumn months. I think if you wanted to wear thick socks with them it would be best to order a half size up. I ordered the blue colour but to me they seem more green. Fab colour and a bit different anyway. I've had 3 pairs of Merrells now and they are so comfy. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but more like a trainer than a hiking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant fit: but yes they are more like a trainer, very light and extremely comfy, couldn’t ever go back to ordinary trainers now, totally hooked , Merrells all the way from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, however I have not hiked in them yet
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, however I have not hiked in them yet, really lightweight so hopefully they should be ok. Using them for a safari which will mostly be in and out of jeeps, not much walking involved but the quality looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. Coote

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - on my second pair now
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - on my second pair now. LIke the fact they are not gortex lined so are nice and breathable. Obviously not waterproof for winter, but I give mine a light spray to help. They are light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great quality trainer, support the feet & look good!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear Merrell trainers as they are designed specifically for walkers. Not disappointed, these are a great fit and support your feet really well! Just a wee niggle, would have preferred elastic toggle but these come with laces.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Murray

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight women’s hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: As described, a lightweight women’s hiking shoe. I bought these to walk the Camino and they were extremely comfortable for 5 days hard walking. They are not waterproof, but dried out very quickly. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Buzz57

customer_reviews.title: Comfy from first wearing
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe, comfortable and supportive from the outset. Lightweight too, which is important to me as given a choice I'd go barefoot everywhere. The fit is true to size. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable walking shoes ideal for warmer days.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ideal for walking in dryish weather and they are very comfortable. They are light and will be handy to pack when we go walking in warmer climates.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes I have another pair of these shoes they are comfortable had to have a size bigger though they started squeaking but it seems to have stopped now on wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Lynne wills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Fit well, look good, not worn too quickly as others have. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Bedfordshire Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Merrells
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were reasonably priced compared to some websites. They are very comfortable. They are nicely contoured inside and I quite light who h is what I was looking for. Arrivedly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously comfortable, straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fabulously comfortable, straight out of the box. I am size 7 with slightly wide feet and these are a perfect fit. Great delivery and very good value for money
customer_reviews.author: nidbib

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, very comfortable with a great fit. I need to use orthotics and the insole in these shoes is removable to fit your own which is fab. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: greenlotus1975

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and light shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and light shoes. I ordered my nirmal size but they are a bit big. I will keep them. Can't be bithered to send them back and will wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: marietim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was like putting on a pair of trendy slippers!
customer_reviews.author: J.Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Merrells
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They are very comfortable with good arch support. Will possibly buy another pair in different color. Thank you m
customer_reviews.author: sheila m starr

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, however, I always buy size 5 and these ones feel a bit too big. I should probably have ordered a 4.5. Think about this before deciding to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers! Heel part is slightly lifted which is great for long walks, the colour is really nice and they are so light. Go half of the size up though, I'm a size 7.5 and I orderd an 8, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: . We did a 7 mile walk the first time I wore them and they were perfectly comfortable. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lizziek

customer_reviews.title: but I purchased these as my Regatta ones had developed an annoying squeak when walking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in August 2018 and have been really comfy. However, we are now in March 2019 (7 months on) and I they have fallen apart. Comfort was 100% but quality poor
customer_reviews.author: john richards

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very lightweight. Fit as expected. I’ve worn them a lot since I got them, often for whole days on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: KMeyer

customer_reviews.title: Really like them, I usually always get the right fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like them, I usually always get the right fit and importantly the right support with the merrell brand. Not used them too much yet but up to yet no issues
customer_reviews.author: tanusky

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great..I have exceedingly difficult feet and couldn't keep them..but nonetheless they are great for the normal footed person.
customer_reviews.author: M L T

customer_reviews.title: They are more like a trainer
customer_reviews.text: Merrells normally come up big but you really need a size up especially if you want to wear thicker socks. They are more like a trainer . They look good and don't look bulky. Very light and well made. Supportive and good for foot problems. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: juliet keeble

customer_reviews.title: Sizing comes up large
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these merrell walking shoes but my usual size 6 was much too big so I had to send them back. Pity as they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Comfy trainers, lovely
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Merrel trainers for years as they are wide fit and very comfortable, but more mint green rather than blue! Love them anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, comfortable and looks great and functional as you would expect from Merrell
customer_reviews.author: Suie

customer_reviews.title: great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers though I've bought them for walking not running in. These are good if you have wide feet and they look nice too for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Jane1

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. Not totally waterproot but good in light rain. Get dry very fast
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: A lovely shoe and sad to return them
customer_reviews.text: Usually Merrill shoes are slightly wider than other makes but this still was too narrow for me. A lovely shoe and sad to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Quilter 432

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these Merrells! They fit really well, are instantly comfortable, are light and great to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and light weight, everything a good walking shoe should be.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Linda J Kitson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but a tad pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, as previous merrell's died. A bit pricey but well worth the cash.
customer_reviews.author: AirborneG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoes, love them, great fit and really comfortable highly recommended thank you
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: Walking shpes
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with these shoes, comfortable,only problem is the colour, their blue looks green to me!
customer_reviews.author: Corgi dog

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 6.5 and I have some other Merrell shoes which came up a little large so this pair I ordered as a size 6 and they fit perfect. Immediately comfortable straight out the box, I wear these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hicken

customer_reviews.title: Smart and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from merrell. Fit is true to size. Well packaged and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy - my second pair of Merrell shoes. Great for walking long distances
customer_reviews.author: annie g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfort.Bought at a bargain price compared to other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: rogC

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, happy when i got it
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, happy when i got it. But now i used them, not a lot, during a year and they are alreay falling apart on the inside. So nice shoe to look at, but cannot be used for a long time. Shame. Expected more from merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone who already owns and likes Merrill footwear. They weren't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Sim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend these Merrell Trainers. I always buy them, have done for years they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable trainers, ok for dry weather and well defined ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable trainers, ok for dry weather and well defined trails. Not sure how robust they'll prove to be for anything more challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wet weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a wet weather Shoe. They do the job
customer_reviews.author: L. Wales

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Only worn a few times and one of the lace holders has already broken. Very, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AnnaH

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a replacement as first pair so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement as first pair so good. Like wearing slippers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I’m trying to achieve 5 miles walking daily ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I’m trying to achieve 5 miles walking daily and was getting some grumbling foot pain but much improved since I started using these.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne D Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Quality walking shoe you can expect from Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers, so comfortable have walked up Snowdon on first outing no problems. I love the colour and have had many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Malcom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfy..
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery . Good fit . Standard size 6 .
customer_reviews.author: mazzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as advertised and very comfortable. Competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic walking shoe. Fits like a glove, light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Turner

customer_reviews.title: brilliant so far
customer_reviews.text: Worn for the first time this weekend, brilliant so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jess's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, even on day one, a great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: pamela linnett

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but they are a bit large
customer_reviews.text: They seem ok, however, they run a little bit large and wide.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vit

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fit, very light and comfortable, fantastic deal at the price
customer_reviews.author: martin bostock

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and confortable, great for Summer hiking.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a really comfortable set of hiking shoes that were also able to maintain my feet at a bearable temperature, as in Summertime, with heavier temperatures, some hiking/trekking shoes get too hot. These came out to be perfect. They're not waterproof, but because they're really breathable, they get dry in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight and waterproof shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife was delighted with these shoes. And yes they are waterproof. Fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: W. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ... as a previous pair at my normal size was great for everyday use but gave me problems when walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in a size larger as a previous pair at my normal size was great for everyday use but gave me problems when walking the camino. These shoes are true to size and very comfortable. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona C.

customer_reviews.title: lasted less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: So I've had these for about a year and 9 months, probably with an average use of once a week for moderate length walks, while I like the fit and the lightness of these, I was surprised and disappointed to notice that the outer fabric has now worn through in a number of areas. While I didn't expect then to be as hardwearing as leather, I did expect them to last longer than they have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great - as I would expect from a Merrell but I wanted WATERPROOF and it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Ms G. A. Crawford

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Siren Edge Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: These Siren Edge shoes from Merrell feature mesh and 3D print mesh upper along with breathable mesh lining. Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability.
feature_bullets: Athletically styled hiker featuring seamless upper overlays with color-pop webbing and ghillie laces
Bellows tongue to keep out debris
M-Select FIT.ECO contoured footbed with organic odor control
